description: Have a go at this healthier apple chips recipe. Just air fry thin slices of apple that have been tossed lightly in cinnamon sugar. Easy and delicious.
keywords: Chips & fries,Jun 2022,Pescatarian,Air fryer,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Apple,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Air-fryer Healthier Apple Chips Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 Pink Lady apple, cut into 1mm-thick slices

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat air fryer to 180Â°C for 2 minutes. Lightly spray air-fryer basket with oil. Place apple in a medium bowl. Sprinkle with sugar and toss to combine.
Working in 3 batches, cook apple in air fryer for 10 minutes or until dehydrated, separating slightly halfway through cooking. Stand for 5 minutes to allow to crisp, then serve.
